Title: Yet Another Property Proxy Implementation
Description:
YAPPI simplifies construction of proxy|derived classes at runtime by implementing|overriding property access methods using user-provided delegates.
YAPPI can help you to autoimplement properties in INotifyPropertyChanged-style or make some other template tasks.
Written in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
YAPPI simplifies construction of proxy|derived classes at runtime by implementing|overriding property access methods and routing calls to user-defined delegates.
YAPPI can help you to autoimplement properties in INotifyPropertyChanged-style or make some other template property implementation tasks.
Written in pure C#.
